name: Bike Jungle
description:
Jungle Bike is a genre terrain racing game, with extremely attractive game design, the player must use intelligence, flexibility by themselves to overcome the obstacles on the track. Bike Jungle game with a lot of complicated racing road that players can play a game screen next outing if not able to conquer a most convincing way. Jungle Bike is truly a challenge for professional gamers.
Be a professional racer terrain and overcome any challenge with Bike Jungle !!!
publishers: IDTV  Viet  Nam Development Technology And Trading Investment Joint Stock Company
